Articles.Content: Lol. IDK.
Page 100 was just spam and talk of spam. You guys! ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> Isn't that what happened to get to 100?

At least the spam was hype spam with some talk about the new update.

On topic. WE MUST REACH PLAID! KEEP HYPING!

> 
> Page 100 was just spam and talk of spam. You guys! ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

It could've been hype and talk of hype, but they blew it. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hmm.. I feel the hype in my blooood.
Come on guys, we don't need to spam to hype!

So are you guys hyped about Harv's little secret addition. I sure am! (don't talk about it here, there is a thread about it)

I just hope my hype is justified and it's something needed or cool.

Well, we made past 100 pages. 

SWEETNESS

To give these pages some actual content:

Scott Manley alluded in his previous livestream that he'll be posting a video showing off 1.0 on sunday.

Discuss!

> 
> To give these pages some actual content:
> Scott Manley alluded in his previous livestream that he'll be posting a video showing off 1.0 on sunday.
> 
> Discuss!

Secretary, cancel that dinner with the leaders of the world sunday, I have to refresh youtube constantly that day.

> 
> Secretary, cancel that dinner with the leaders of the world sunday, I have to refresh youtube constantly that day.

ISIS, North Korea, Putin and Vegetarians can wait.

> ISIS, North Korea, Putin and Vegetarians can wait.

Vegans are a bigger problem

tofu \*shudders

here's something else to chew on: Physical CE (gamersedition.com) and GOG.com as retailers starting on Monday. I dunno if it was mentioned. Personally, I'd suggest adding ~30 boosters to the train and overclocking the engine.

I am hyped for resources!

> 
> Isn't that what happened to get to 100?

No, that was done to get to 20.
I'm inordinately hyped that the drills have smoke coming out of them. Smoke was the only thing I missed from Kethane when I switched to Karbonite.

> 
> I'm inordinately hyped that the drills have smoke coming out of them. Smoke was the only thing I missed from Kethane when I switched to Karbonite.

There's no smoke in space, it's dust. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

The last time I was even half as excited for a video game launch as I am now, was Starcraft 2. And I was about half as excited as I am now.

C'MON MONDAY!!!!

Uh hype?

May I ask about what will happen as we near 1.0 station? Obviously the train needs to stop somehow. Also shouldn't we be time traveling at these speeds (I really don't want to arrive at the station thousands of years late)?
I plan on just jumping out and doing a tuck-and-roll. Worked for .90
Woot hype!!!
